summary: The diff implements a dedicated full-page Admin Dashboard with view-state navigation from the main Task Manager, includes a Back control, adds UI access control with an unauthorized message for non-admins, and updates pagination clamping to use an effect (avoiding render-time state updates).

hallucinated_features.description: Sets and restores the browser document title when entering/leaving the Admin Dashboard page.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention changing document.title; this is additional behavior beyond the requested UI conversion/navigation/access-control/pagination changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds additional informational UI copy about the admin limit ("Maximum 3 admins allowed.") on the Admin Dashboard page.
hallucinated_features.reason: While consistent with existing functionality constraints, the BuildRequest did not request adding new explanatory text about the admin cap.
